overview: From the moment Imad Aldin invites Manuel Lozano through the front door it is fantasy come to life. As a well hung Muzzafar’s dancing starts an all-out orgy of hot muscle and huge cocks we are carried away with the memories and imaginings of each of the men gathered round the room. The thoughts that fill their minds take us through scene after scene of men sharing hookah and sex. After watching the twosomes, threesomes and ‘moresomes’ in this film you may well find yourself looking for a hookah bar in hopes of finding your own Arabian Playhouse.
title: Arabian Playhouse 1
